_sText:
GENERAL INFORMATION:

It's a smaller version of cs_assault
Lots of props and hiding places
Added in a prop_ragdoll for effect 
Made more space for maneuvering

MAP DESCRIPTION:

On 12 November 2008, at the Belmont train station, a terrorist group hijacked a STARLINE (R) company trailer which was delivering money to the Government Bank for financial issues. They smuggled the money down to their hideout, but only a little of the money was taken before an elite counter-terroist unit was dispatched. They have to stop the terrorists while being careful about other people since the terrorists already killed one innocent...

TIPS:

There is a ladder above the crashed trailer which makes a good vantage point
The fruit boxes make a good bridge to the trailer if you crouch jump to the trailer

HELP IN:

If any one can help me about making the car alarm sound go on through out the game, pls tell me :)
Also, if anyone can pls help make a radar image for this map, i will be very thankful :)
